sentences.sContent: Unfounded rumours of accounting problems hit stocks of other companies.
sentences.sCn: 有关账目问题的无根据的谣言打击了其他公司的股票。

synos.tran: 未建立的；没有理由的；没有事实根据的

remMethod.val: un(不) + founded(有根据的) → 无事实根据的

trans.tranOther: unfounded statements, feelings, opinions etc are wrong because they are not based on facts
